name: General Tullius

aspects.high_concept: Disciplined Imperial General Sent to Quell the Rebellion
other_aspects: Loyal to the Emperor Above All
War is Politics by Other Means

stunts: Legion Commander: +2 to Tactics when commanding Imperial forces in battle
Tactical Superiority: Once per scene, grant all allied Imperials in the zone +2 to their next action
Veteran Officer: +2 to Will when resisting intimidation or demoralization
Strategic Mind: Can use Tactics instead of Notice to assess threats and opportunities
notes: General Tullius is a career soldier from Cyrodiil sent to pacify Skyrim. He sees the Stormcloak rebellion as an unnecessary distraction from the real threat - the Aldmeri Dominion. Efficient and pragmatic, but struggles to understand Nord culture. Skills note: 'Tactics' and 'Command' are custom Skyrim campaign skills appropriate for military leaders - Tactics for strategic planning, Command for direct troop leadership.

personality_notes.speaking_style: Direct, military precision, formal. Impatient with politics.
motivations: Prepare Skyrim for the next war with the Thalmor
Prove his worth to the Emperor
fears: The rebellion lasting too long and weakening the Empire
Thalmor using the civil war to their advantage
quirks: Relies heavily on Legate Rikke for cultural insight
Prefers direct military solutions to political maneuvering

initial_meeting.greeting: You have the look of a soldier. Perhaps you'll prove useful to the Empire.

responses.option: I want to join the Legion

recruitment_path.dialogue: Good. Report to Legate Rikke. We need every able body to crush this rebellion.

war_explanation.dialogue: Ulfric Stormcloak murdered the High King and started this rebellion. It's treason, plain and simple. We will restore order.

branching_interactions.if_imperial: Primary quest giver and military commander
branching_interactions.if_stormcloak: Major antagonist, will personally oversee execution if captured
branching_interactions.if_neutral: Attempts recruitment, sees neutrality as wasted potential
branching_interactions.respected_warrior: Respects martial prowess and dedication to causes

combat_tactics: Commands from rear with strategic overview. Uses Legion formations and discipline. Will personally fight if pressed but prefers to direct troops. Focuses on weak points and overwhelming force.
story_hooks: Sent from Cyrodiil specifically to end the rebellion
Frustrated by Thalmor interference in Imperial affairs
Relies on Legate Rikke to understand Nord culture
Sees Ulfric as a traitor, not a freedom fighter
Believes Empire is Skyrim's only defense against Thalmor
Personal honor tied to success in Skyrim
